data.eml:eml: Nomenclatural changes in Anastatus Motschulsky and the description of Anastatus eurycanthae Gibson n. sp. (Eupelmidae: Eupelminae), an egg parasitoid of Eurycantha calcarata Lucas (Phasmida: Phasmatidae) from Papua New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gibson, Gary A. P., Dewhurst, Charles, Makai, Simon (2012): Nomenclatural changes in Anastatus Motschulsky and the description of Anastatus eurycanthae Gibson n. sp. (Eupelmidae: Eupelminae), an egg parasitoid of Eurycantha calcarata Lucas (Phasmida: Phasmatidae) from Papua New Guinea. Zootaxa 3419: 53-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213497
